attributes.action: reverse the decision to abolish the 10pc lower-rate of income tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chancellor in his Budget of 21 March 2007 abolished the 10 percent lower-rate of income tax, pertinent to incomes not exceeding £15,000 per annum.  This will also affect everyone in receipt of a pension including old age pensioners. In effect, this has increased my income tax level by 100 percent and is an affront to those who are not in a position to earn anymore.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
